statements: SELECT * FROM LocationData;
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM LocationData WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM LocationData ORDER BY city ASC, country DESC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as location_count FROM LocationData GROUP BY city HAVING location_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM LocationData ORDER BY city ASC, country DESC;
SELECT location_id, address, city FROM LocationData WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT latitude, longitude, address FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, address FROM LocationData WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT id, city, country FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM payment_verification WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, country FROM location_data ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_verification WHERE user_id = 123 AND location_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE city='New York' ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY id;
SELECT city, country FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT count(*) as total_locations FROM location_data;
SELECT city, country, verification_status FROM location_data INNER JOIN payment_verification ON location_data.id = payment_verification.location_id ORDER BY city ASC, country ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;

SELECT id, address FROM location_data ORDER BY address DESC;

SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT payment_amount, verification_status FROM payment_verification ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, location_data.address FROM users JOIN location_data ON users.id = location_data.id;

SELECT city, latitude FROM location_data WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY latitude DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT method_name, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, location_id, verification_status, verification_date FROM verification_logs ORDER BY verification_date ASC
